arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: PSG will host Auxerre on Saturday at the Parc des Princes, seeking to bounce back from their first defeat of the season against Marseille. PSG vs Auxerre – Match Preview and Team News Date: 27th September, Saturday. Kick-off: 8:05pm BST. Venue: Parc Des Princes, Paris. arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: PSG are set to welcome Auxerre to the Parc des Princes this Saturday as they aim to recover from their opening Ligue 1 defeat against Marseille. The reigning champions sit second in Ligue 1 after five matches, level on points with Monaco, Lyon, and Strasbourg, but placed second due to goal difference. arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Marvin Senaya sends a strong message
arts.sum: This Saturday at 9:05 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) host Auxerre (10th) at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 6 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – Pélissier “lucky” to challenge the European champion!
arts.sum: This Saturday at 9:05 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) host Auxerre (10th) at the Parc des Princes in Ligue 1’s 6th matchday. Ahead of the clash, Auxerre coach Christophe Pélissier spoke to the press about facing the European champions. Pélissier: “We’re not playing our season on this match” “It’s a privilege to face the best […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Auxerre – An important player’s return confirmed in Paris!
arts.sum: Bradley Barcola (23, forward), who missed the match against Olympique de Marseille last weekend, returned to full training with Paris Saint-Germain on Thursday. This is good news for Luis Enrique and PSG, who are preparing for a series of important matches in Ligue 1 and Europe. Starting, of course, with their home game against Auxerre […]
